items.name: case configurationDisabled
items.desc: An error code indicating the VPN configuration associated with the VPN manager isnâ€™t enabled.

items.name: case configurationInvalid
items.desc: An error code indicating the VPN configuration associated with the VPN manager object is invalid.

items.name: case connectionFailed
items.desc: The connection to the VPN server failed.

items.name: case configurationStale
items.desc: An error code that indicates another process modfied the VPN configuration since the last time the app loaded the configuration.

items.name: case configurationReadWriteFailed
items.desc: An error code that indicates an error occurred while reading or writing the Network Extension preferences.

items.name: case configurationUnknown
items.desc: An error code that indicates that unspecified error occurred.
